name: Neko99
description:
The popular card game “Neko99” is here!

Neko99 is a card game won by using number cards and special cards with strategy.
Take your turns in throwing down number cards and push the total value of thrown cards toward 99, while using various special cards to turn the tide and make the wind blow your way. Be careful not to exceed a sum of 99 and blow yourself out of the game!
Besides the traditional game rules, we provide a special mode without a reminder for your current sum value, which tests your ability of mental calculation and memory! Exciting!
Four people can play together even with a single iPhone/iPad. We also provide Turn-based matching which allows you to play against other players in the world.

Game rules
・Four players (including the Computer) take turns to play
・Throw down number cards to add to a total sum value on the table. If a player cannot play without causing this total value to exceed 99, he or she loses. The player who lasts the longest in the game wins
・Use special cards to turn the tables

Pass: skip your turn and let the next player play
Assign: appoint a specific player to play
Reverse: reverse the current direction of play
+/- 10: make the total sum on the table plus (or minus) ten
+/- 20: make the total sum on the table plus (or minus) twenty
99: directly make the total sum on the table = 99
